query:
SELECT d.codigo, d.nome, COUNT(DISTINCT cd.curso_id) as total_cursos
FROM disciplinas d
JOIN cursos_disciplinas cd ON d.id = cd.disciplina_id
WHERE d.codigo = 'COM100'
GROUP BY d.id, d.codigo, d.nome;
